name: Space Rocks
description: Fly through your asteroid filled music library. Play the same music track in different ways with your own custom settings. The power to experience your music depending on your mood.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2/Vista/7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 mb video memory, Shader Model 5.0+ DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 700 MB available space
